mapper.select: SELECT T1.goods_id AS goodsId, T1.goods_status AS goodsStatus, T1.goods_level AS goodsLevel, T1.company_id AS companyId, T1.goods_type_id AS goodsTypeId, T1.update_time AS updateTime, T1.product_icon AS productIcon, T1.manufacture_date AS manufactureDate, T1.quality_guarantee AS qualityGuarantee, T1.raw_material AS rawMaterial, T1.goods_explain AS goodsExplain, T1.goods_name AS goodsName, T1.manufacturer_id AS manufacturerId, T1.supplier_id AS supplierId, T1.place_of_production AS placeOfProduction, T2.goods_type_name AS goodsTypeName, T3.supplier_name AS supplierName, T4.manufacturer_name AS manufacturerName, T5.barcode_number AS barcodeNumber, T6.city_name AS placeOfProductionName FROM `goods` AS T1 INNER JOIN `goods_type` AS T2 ON T1.goods_type_id = T2.goods_type_id INNER JOIN `supplier` AS T3 ON T1.supplier_id = T3.supplier_id INNER JOIN `manufacturer` AS T4 ON T1.manufacturer_id = T4.manufacturer_id INNER JOIN `city` AS T6 ON T1.place_of_production = T6.city_id INNER JOIN `barcode` AS T5 ON T1.goods_id = T5.goods_id WHERE T5.barcode_number = #{barcodeNumber}
